INV-ADP-05.description: Error No Leak - no path local, stack, secrets

INV-ADP-07.description: UUID via factory, not crypto.randomUUID() direct

INV-ADV-02.description: Attack not in Grammar implies attack impossible

INV-ADV-03.description: Attack in Grammar implies system REJECT or ABSORB

INV-ADV-05.description: Attack severity in {LOW, MEDIUM, HIGH, CRITICAL}

INV-BP-03.description: Writes only in nexus/blueprint or tools/blueprint

INV-CANON-04.description: Hash Merkle stable (meme faits = meme hash)

INV-CHAOS-04.description: Isolation - effect on module_A does not affect module_B

INV-CHAOS-05.description: Recovery - system returns to nominal state

INV-CHART-001.description: All 14 emotions must have assigned colors

INV-CHART-002.description: Plutchik wheel must have 8 primary segments

INV-CHART-003.description: Bar chart must support sorting by value

INV-CHART-004.description: Chart must have view toggle capability

INV-CHART-006.description: Empty state must be handled gracefully

INV-CLI-01.description: Exit Code Coherent - success=true implies exitCode=0

INV-CLI-02.description: No Silent Failure - errors produce stderr message

INV-CLI-03.description: Deterministic Output - same input + same seed = same output

INV-CLI-04.description: Duration Always Set - duration > 0 for all commands

INV-CLI-10.description: Real file I/O for production use

INV-CONV-01.description: VAD preservation - valence, arousal, dominance preserved exactly

INV-CORE-005.description: Analysis ID must be unique format

INV-CRE-02.description: No Write Authority - returns proposal, no write

INV-CRE-04.description: Deterministic Output - same input = same output

INV-CRE-06.description: Template Purity - frozen data, no mutation

INV-CRE-07.description: Request Validation - all requests validated before processing

INV-CRYSTAL-01.description: Immutability - Crystal cannot be modified once formed

INV-CRYSTAL-05.description: Reproducibility - Same inputs produce same Crystal

INV-DASH-003.description: Emotion overview must show aggregated data

INV-DASH-004.description: Recent analyses must be sorted by date

INV-DASH-005.description: Empty state must show welcome message

INV-DASH-006.description: Navigation to analyze must be available

INV-EMO-05.description: Arc casse = WARN ou FAIL selon severite

INV-GOV-03.description: Validation humaine obligatoire pour actions critiques

INV-GW-01.description: Zero Direct Call / Rate limit checked before validation

INV-GW-02.description: Schema Determinism / Blocked input never reaches output

INV-GW-03.description: No Hidden Mutation / Quarantine preserves original data

INV-GW-04.description: Version Pinning / Result contains complete context

INV-HIST-001.description: History must be sortable by date

INV-HIST-002.description: History must be filterable by emotion

INV-HIST-003.description: Delete must remove only targeted entry

INV-I-02.description: MAJOR bump required for breaking changes

INV-INPUT-002.description: Stats must include characters, words, sentences

INV-INPUT-004.description: Max file size must be positive

INV-IPC-001.description: Health status must be valid enum

INV-IPC-004.description: IPC commands must be string literals

INV-IPC-005.description: Error codes must be uppercase with underscores

INV-J-07.description: Rollback target must be verified stable

INV-LAYOUT-002.description: Layout must have header, main, footer

INV-LAYOUT-004.description: Pages count must match nav items

INV-LAYOUT-005.description: Default sidebar state must be open

INV-MEM-12.description: Max 1 event per entry per run (C05 FIX)

INV-NOTIF-006.description: Toast must be dismissible by default

INV-ORACLE-001.description: Analysis result must have valid ID

INV-ORACLE-05.description: no magic numbers - all from policy

INV-QUA-01.description: Quarantined item isolated from main system

INV-RIPPLE-04.description: Tracabilite complete (chaque ripple trace jusqu'a source)

INV-RIPPLE-05.description: Respect du canon (ripple ne peut contredire)

INV-SCALE-05.description: Ordered aggregation (sort by index before Merkle)

INV-SET-001.description: Theme must support light, dark, and system

INV-SET-003.description: Min text length must be bounded

INV-SKEP-04.description: Zero tolerance for Deus Ex Machina

INV-STORE-003.description: Max history must be in range [10, 500]

INV-STR-02.description: chunk_size ne change pas le hash

INV-STRESS-01.description: Pipeline stable under high load / Hash Stability

INV-STRESS-02.description: No data corruption under stress / Latency Bound

INV-STRESS-03.description: All edge cases rejected correctly / Memory Bound

INV-STRESS-05.description: Determinism maintained under stress / Zero Drift

INV-TEMP-03.description: Fairness - handler_executed for all active handlers

INV-THEME-002.description: Light and dark must have opposite bg colors

INV-THEME-006.description: System theme must respond to OS changes

INV-TRACE-01.description: Hash chain / Toute decision critique est tracee

INV-TRUTH-03.description: Reference inconnue = FAIL en mode strict

INV-UI-002.description: Phase must be within valid range

INV-UI-004.description: Colors must be valid hex codes

INV-VIEW-001.description: Analysis must require minimum text length

INV-VIEW-004.description: File upload must accept only text files

INV-WIRE-04.description: Erreurs = NexusError (error_code, pas de stack leak)
